description: Deletes a target group. You can't delete a target group if it is used in a listener rule or if the target group creation is in progress.

parameters.name: targetGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the target group.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target group.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the target group.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status. You can retry the operation if the status is DELETE_FAILED. However, if you retry it while the status is DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, the status doesn't change.
